name: rescape-validate
description: Ramda validation utilities for the Rescape platform
author: Andy Likuski

scripts.build:commonjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=commonjs  node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.build:es: cross-env  NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir es
scripts.build:umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/index.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/index.min.js
scripts.build: yarn run build:commonjs && yarn run build:es && yarn run build:umd && yarn run build:umd:min
scripts.prepare: yarn run clean && yarn run lint && yarn test && yarn run build
scripts.docs:build: yarn run docs:prepare && gitbook build -g reactjs/redux && cp logo/apple-touch-icon.png _book/gitbook/images/apple-touch-icon-precomposed-152.png && cp logo/favicon.ico _book/gitbook/images
scripts.docs:publish: yarn run docs:clean && yarn run docs:build && cp CNAME _book && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:reactjs/redux gh-pages --force
scripts.build-publish-patch: yarn run build && yarn run publish-patch
scripts.build-publish-minor: yarn run build && yarn run publish-minor
